name: Spookabra
description:
Move : ZQSD/WASD/Left Joystick

Attack : E/Left Click/Gamepad X

Special Attack : R/Right Click/Gamepad Y

In Spookabra, protect your ghost (and yourself in the process) from monster attacks that threaten your castle (and your ghost in the process). Whether playing alone or with a partner's ghost, use your skills to survive frantic waves of ghosts and golems!

Gameplay music by Akuro Søren
